first_para: Theresa Anne Villiers (born 5 March 1968) is a British Conservative Party politician from the Villiers family, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Chipping Barnet since 2005 and the Secretary of State for Northern Ireland since 2012.

full.extract: Theresa Anne Villiers (born 5 March 1968) is a British Conservative Party politician from the Villiers family, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Chipping Barnet since 2005 and the Secretary of State for Northern Ireland since 2012.
full.title: Theresa Villiers
